title: Gandhi Vega
text:
Gandhi Vega (born April 29, 1977 in <a href="Torre%C3%B3n">Torreón</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>) is a former <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who last played for <a href="Irapuato%20FC">Irapuato FC</a>.
Honours.
Club.
<a href="Irapuato%20FC">Irapuato</a>
